title: Download ESM Chart package
content:
This topic guides you on how to get the installation package for the suite. First, you must download the relevant version of the ESM Helm chart package from the Software Licenses and Downloads (SLD) website for the suite installation. 

Name Binary name
ESM chart package ESM_Helm_Chart-2x.x.x.zip
The versions are indicated using the x.x.x notation. Replace it with the version relevant to your deployment.  For example, if your deployment needs version 25.1.0 ESM Helm chart package, replace ESM_Helm_Chart-2x.x.x.zip with ESM_Helm_Chart-25.1.0.zip. 
  1. Download the package, and copy it to a temporary directory on a first control plane node or the bastion node.
  2. Run the following command to unzip the suite Helm package: 
    unzip ESM_Helm_Chart-2x.x.x.zip -d ESM_Helm_Chart-2x.x.x
    The unzipped package contains the following files:
    • esm-x.x.x+2x.x.0.zip
    • esm-x.x.x+2x.x.0.zip.sig
  3. (Optional) Verify the ESM helm package. Skip this step if you don't want to verify the package. To verify the ESM helm package, follow the instructions in knowledge article KM000003948 and use the ot-package-sign.pub key which you can download from the knowledge article.
  4. Run the following command to unzip the esm-x.x.x+2x.x.x.zip file: 
    cd ESM_Helm_Chart-2x.x.x
unzip esm-x.x.x+2x.x.x.zip
    The unzipped file contains the following files.
    Folder Folder contents
    charts

    esm-x.x.x+2x.x.x.tgz: The ESM helm chart package.

    esm-x.x.x+2x.x.x.tgz.prov: A signature file for an ESM helm chart deployment using AppHub.

    esm-precheck-x.x.x+2x.x.x.tgz: A precheck package used before an ESM helm upgrade to this release.
    samples

    values.yaml: A sample file for an ESM helm chart deployment. This sample file includes the definition for each key to help you in the customization of your own values.yaml file.

    fedramp-values.yaml: A sample file for an ESM helm chart deployment on GovCloud (FIPS mode). 

    auditCollector-values.yaml: A sample file for Audit Collector installations.

    enableAudit-values.yaml: A sample configuration file for enabling Audit in your system.
    scripts Contains configuration and installation scripts.
    licenses Contains Open source software license attribution files.
